'''Glittergray Hunting Hound''' is a type of [[Dogs|dog]] that can be found in the wild.

==Locations==
Glittergray Hunting Hounds can be found around the [[Opera Epiclese]], [[Court of Fontaine: Fleuve Cendre|Fleuve Cendre]], and [[Romaritime Harbor]] in [[Fontaine]].
